title: Strawberry Muffins
description: Delicious and fluffy muffins loaded with fresh strawberries.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk wet ingredients.
Combine both, then fold in strawberries.
Pour into muffin tin and bake for 25 minutes.

title: Vegetable Sandwich
description: Quick and easy sandwich with fresh vegetables and flavorful chutney.
instructions: Butter the bread slices.
Spread green chutney on one side.
Layer sliced veggies, sprinkle salt and pepper.
Grill or serve as-is.

title: Poha
description: Flattened rice dish lightly fried with onions, mustard seeds, and spices.
instructions: Rinse poha and keep aside.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds, onion, chili, and curry leaves.
Add poha, salt, turmeric. Mix well and cook for 5 mins.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Creamy North Indian curry made with paneer cubes simmered in rich tomato gravy.
instructions: Heat butter, sauté onion and tomato puree.
Add spices and cook till thick.
Add cream and paneer, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Rajma Chawal
description: Red kidney beans cooked in thick gravy, served with steamed rice.
instructions: Soak rajma overnight, then pressure cook.
Make gravy with onion, tomato, spices.
Add rajma and simmer.
Serve with hot rice.

title: Veg Pulao
description: Aromatic rice cooked with mixed vegetables and spices.
instructions: Sauté onions and spices.
Add vegetables and rice.
Add water and cook until rice is done.

title: Dal Tadka
description: Yellow lentils tempered with garlic and spices.
instructions: Cook dal until soft.
Prepare tempering with spices and pour over dal.
Simmer for 5 minutes.

title: Matar Paneer
description: Peas and paneer cubes cooked in tomato-based curry.
instructions: Fry paneer lightly.
Make curry with onion, tomato, and spices.
Add peas and paneer, simmer till done.

title: Aloo Gobi
description: Dry curry made with potatoes and cauliflower, flavored with Indian spices.
instructions: Heat oil and add cumin.
Add vegetables and spices.
Cook covered until tender.

title: Fruit Salad
description: Healthy salad with a mix of fresh seasonal fruits.
instructions: Chop all fruits into a bowl.
Add honey and lemon juice.
Mix and serve chilled.

title: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpeas served with deep-fried bread (bhature).
instructions: Cook chole with onion, tomato, spices.
Make dough and fry bhature.
Serve hot together.

title: Curd Rice
description: South Indian comfort food made with rice and curd, tempered with spices.
instructions: Mix rice with curd.
Prepare tempering with spices.
Mix and serve chilled or warm.
